tool_description: Access to Zen Alert monitoring features from you APP or WebAPP.
name: Zen Alert
title: Zen Alert

api_list.name: List Days
List Languages
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://zen-alert-zen-alert.p.rapidapi.com/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zen-alert-zen-alert.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

url = "https://zen-alert-zen-alert.p.rapidapi.com/languages"

required_parameters.name: process
required_parameters.description: name of processes separated by a comma

api_list.name: List Directions
api_list.description: Directions list of a specific  user_id, thing_id, alert_code_id or vitalsignal_code_id

api_list.name: Delete Thing
api_list.description: Delete Thing, also Computer (or ZenBox) of is unlinked

api_list.name: Confirm Email Address
api_list.description: Confirms the email address of an account

List Alert Codes
api_list.description: View all the Alerts Codes of account

api_list.description: View all the Things in the account

api_list.name: View Billing Informations
Password Recovery
Create Account
Update Password
Update Billing Informations
Check Client Version
List Time Zones

required_parameters.name: order
required_parameters.description: Order list of Time Zone by "city" (default) or by "continent"

api_list.name: List Active Vital Signals
api_list.description: Lists all the Active Vital Signal in the account

api_list.name: Update Thing
api_list.description: Update Thing (also Computer and ZenBox)  informations

api_list.description: Delete an Alert Direction from an User, Object, Alert Code or Vital Signal Code

Update Regional Settings
api_list.description: Update the Account Regional Setting s

api_list.name: List Vital Signal Code
api_list.description: Lists all Vital Signal Codes in the account

api_list.name: Login
Update Active Vital Signal
api_list.description: Create, Update or Delete Active Notice

required_parameters.name: timeactivityset
required_parameters.description: Univocal code of the active notice in the format 'Ymd H: i: s'. Leave blank to create a new active notice

required_parameters.name: sunday
required_parameters.description: 0 for disable, 1 for enable. Default is 0

required_parameters.name: monday
required_parameters.description: 0 for disable, 1 for enable. Default is 0

required_parameters.name: tuesday
required_parameters.description: 0 for disable, 1 for enable. Default is 0

required_parameters.name: wednesday
required_parameters.description: 0 for disable, 1 for enable. Default is 0

required_parameters.name: thursday
required_parameters.description: 0 for disable, 1 for enable. Default is 0

required_parameters.name: friday
required_parameters.description: 0 for disable, 1 for enable. Default is 0

required_parameters.name: saturday
required_parameters.description: 0 for disable, 1 for enable. Default is 0
